# Getting started

## Installation

Download ExpressionAnalysis from GitHub and add it to the environment:

```{bash, eval=FALSE}
git clone https://github.com/interactivereport/ExpressionAnalysis.git
cd ExpressionAnalysis
git checkout publication

#Check the path of current directory and add it to $PATH:
CurrentDir=`pwd`
PATH="$CurrentDir:$PATH"
export $PATH
```

## File hierarchy

